channel.description: Recent content in LSE:DWL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: American Axle Seeks $2.3 Billion to Help Fund Dowlais Takeover
item.description: American Axle & Manufacturing Inc. is looking to raise $2.3 billion in the US leveraged-finance market to help fund its acquisition of Dowlais Group Plc.
